Package org.lazywizard.lazylib.campaign.orbits

Class EllipticalOrbit

Object
EllipticalOrbit
All Implemented Interfaces:
OrbitAPI
public class EllipticalOrbit extends Object implements OrbitAPI
Represents an elliptical orbit path.
Since:
1.9
Author:
LazyWizard

  • Constructor Details

    • EllipticalOrbit

      public EllipticalOrbit(SectorEntityToken focus, float startAngle, float orbitWidth, float orbitHeight, float orbitAngle, float daysPerOrbit)
      Creates an elliptical orbit around a focus object.
      Parameters:
      focus - What to orbit around.
      startAngle - The angle (in degrees) that the orbit will begin at. 0 degrees = right - this is not relative to orbitAngle.
      orbitWidth - The width of the ellipse that makes up the orbital path.
      orbitHeight - The height of the ellipse that makes up the orbital path.
      orbitAngle - The angular offset of the ellipse that makes up the orbital path.
      daysPerOrbit - How long it should take for us to make one orbit around focus.
      Since:
      1.9

  • Method Details

    • getAngle

      public float getAngle()
      Returns the current angle along the orbital path of the orbiting entity.
      Returns:
      The angle of the current position along the elliptical path.

      public float getOrbitAngle()

      Returns:

      Since:
      1.9

    • setAngle

      public void setAngle(float angle)
      Explicitly sets where along our orbital path we should be.
      Parameters:
      angle - The angle (in degrees) along the orbital path we should be moved to.
      Since:
      1.9
